title: My Download in
body: After the newest update I logged out and after some few hours it is on a loop saying theres an update but the update was done earlier. I uninstalled LoL and downloaded it again, this time it worked and i went to the shop to buy blitzcrank and upon entering a match my game crashed and it says something about a zlibb.dll file so i uninstalled it again but this time theres no progress on the download except the download stopped at 76% and to my surprise the download was downloading backwards it became 69% then it became 73% then the client crashed. Im frustrated now wat should i Do?

replies.body: Hmmmm it kinda sounds like your installation may not have been working correctly, and some of those game files kept getting messed up so it needed to try repatching. Make sure you're running the installer as admin by right clicking and running as admin, and maybe try using an ethernet connection if possible during  the download and patch.

Oh i tried doing a virus scan if theres something messing up my files as you said and i found out theres a virus that adds random shortcuts anywhere so i guess it contributed to the damage. Imma try fixing it and imma update what happened.
Iiiinteresting. If you need any help along the way don't hesitate to hit me back up or reach out to our techs!
Thanks man i fixed it now.
Oh it also said about my files are being corrupt. Btw can u give a good antivirus? sorry wasnt active for days.
Theres a typo in my title it was supposed to be My download is messed up
